rules.title: Third-Party Financial Liability Insurance Requirement
rules.description: All yachts must be covered under applicable Third-Party Financial Liability insurance in an amount determined by the Company. Insurance must be provided by a prestigious insurance company and a copy must be delivered before any certificate of permission is issued.
violation_actions: All removal expenses charged to Yacht Owner

rules.title: Hot Work Safety Requirements
rules.description: During any hot works (wood, paint, varnish, welding, grinding, sanding, scraping) all necessary measures must be taken to prevent other yachts and facilities from being polluted and damaged. Works without proper measures will be interrupted immediately.

rules.title: Entry-Exit Documentation and Procedures
rules.description: Yacht Owner must know legislation and take necessary precautions for entry/exit into Turkish territorial waters, prepare necessary information and valid documents regarding Yacht, Owner, Crew and Customers.

rules.title: Duration of Stay in Turkey - Foreign Flag Yachts
rules.description: Foreign-flag yachts may stay up to two years in Turkey for maintenance, repair, docking or wintering purposes. Contract must be renewed annually or yacht will be subject to customs expropriation procedures.

rules.title: Mooring Agreement and Documentation
rules.description: Yacht Owner must fill out and sign complete Mooring Agreement before entry. Must present valid Tonnage Certificate, Seaworthiness Certificate, Insurance policy, and proof of signatory competency.

rules.title: Fire Prevention and Fire Extinguishing Equipment
rules.description: Yacht Owner must take all necessary measures to avoid fire occurrence and keep registered fire extinguishing devices as determined by legal regulations. At least one fire extinguisher must be visible and easily accessible.

rules.title: Waste Water Management
rules.description: For yachts without waste water tanks, it is forbidden to use toilets and bathrooms while in Marina. Forbidden to wash dishes/clothes or wash yacht with detergent. Must use Marina facilities.
violation_actions: Cleaning fees collected from Yacht Owner

rules.title: Hazardous Materials Storage and Handling
rules.description: No fuel, flammable, toxic or hazardous substances can be brought into Marina unless in safe, impermeable, durable containers. Must comply with all regulations and Health & Safety policy. Chemical substances cannot be pumped into Marina or sea.

rules.title: Launching-Lifting Yacht Condition Liability
rules.description: Loss and damage from breaking of decayed or weak yacht parts, drop keel separation, during travel lift transportation are not covered by Financial Liability Insurance and not Company responsibility.

rules.title: Company Liability for Lifting Equipment Failure
rules.description: Company guarantees and is responsible for loss/damage from travel lift insufficiency/failure or personnel negligence during launching/lifting, finalized by court decree proving Company fault.

rules.title: Owner-Employed Maintenance Staff Liability
rules.description: If Yacht Owner employs their own staff for maintenance/repair instead of Marina personnel, any loss/damage from their work is not Marina responsibility and not covered by Company Financial Liability Insurance.

rules.title: Fire Safety During Maintenance-Repair
rules.description: Yacht Owner must take all measures to avoid fire during maintenance-repair. Strictly forbidden to keep explosive substances on board. Forbidden to bring LPG cylinders or keep highly flammable substances.

rules.title: Subcontractor Approval and Entry Requirements
rules.description: Subcontractors hired by Yacht Owners for maintenance/repair are subject to Marina Management approval. Must be issued Temporary Entry card and sign for it.

rules.title: Work Permits and Third-Party Liability Insurance for Repairs
rules.description: Without prior written Company permission, no work other than simple routine repair/maintenance may be done by Owner/captain/crew/family/subcontractor. Workers must submit Third-Party Liability Insurance policy before commencing work.

rules.title: Approved Subcontractors and Entry Fees
rules.description: Yacht owner cannot use subcontractors not approved by Company. Approved subcontractors charged entrance fee and/or commission against work permit. Applies to both dry dock and sea area.

rules.title: Waste Disposal Regulations
rules.description: Forbidden to dispose waste materials (bilge, sewage, waste oil, batteries, oil filters, organic/recyclable wastes) outside designated areas. Violations result in pollution fees per Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality tariff and reporting to official bodies.
violation_actions: Pollution fee charged per municipality tariff
No refund for remaining contract period

rules.title: Marina Manager Authority to Remove Violators
rules.description: Marina Manager shall warn those who breach regulations, disturb order/peace, or pose danger. May notify Harbormaster and remove violators from Marina. May unilaterally terminate Mooring Agreements. Yacht removal charges borne by Owner.
violation_actions: All charges borne by Yacht Owner

rules.title: Marina Navigation Speed Limit
rules.description: Yacht must navigate at speed conforming to marine procedures without damaging or disturbing other yachts (speed limit 3 knots maximum). Only by engine power, without using sail.

rules.title: Outstanding Debt Payment Before Launch
rules.description: Yacht Owner must pay any outstanding debt to Company before Yacht is launched into sea. Otherwise, Owner liable for any loss/damages to Marina from failure to launch.

rules.title: Right of Retention for Outstanding Debts
rules.description: Marina Manager may prevent Yacht from leaving Marina by obtaining departure ban from Harbourmaster, exercising right of retention per Civil Code Article 950, until Yacht Owner pays outstanding debt.

rules.title: Marina Security Area Access Control
rules.description: No one can enter marina security area without permission, except those authorized by Marina Management (vehicle/person) and those with entry card issued for security area.

rules.title: Pet Policy and Restrictions
rules.description: Keeping pets requires written permission from Management after presenting necessary documentation. Pets prohibited from common areas unattended and without collar/leash. Owner responsible for cleaning and any damage/harm caused.

rules.title: Water Activities Prohibition
rules.description: Forbidden to swim, dive, fish, surf or use water skis, jet skis, or similar seacrafts in the Marina.

rules.title: Electrical Safety and Heating Sources
rules.description: No bare light and heating sources can be used (except normal yacht lighting and cooking stoves), no barbecues, no open fire. Yacht installations must use proper electrical cables/adapters approved by Management according to ampere rating.

rules.title: Vehicle Speed Limit in Marina
rules.description: Marina Management determines speed limits displayed on signs/roads. Where no signs exist, maximum speed is 10km/h. Violators and their vehicles banned from Marina, entry cards cancelled.

safety.name: Safety Compliance
safety.description: Fire safety, accident prevention, emergency procedures, equipment requirements

environmental.description: Waste disposal, pollution prevention, hazardous materials handling

insurance_and_liability.name: Insurance and Liability
insurance_and_liability.description: Insurance requirements, liability coverage, financial responsibility

permits_and_licenses.name: Permits and Licenses
permits_and_licenses.description: Work permits, hot work permits, subcontractor authorization

operational.description: Navigation, mooring, launching, lifting, maintenance procedures

security.description: Access control, entry cards, authorized personnel, security measures

critical.description: Critical violations posing immediate danger or legal risk

warning.description: Verbal or written warning issued to violator

work_stoppage.description: Immediate cessation of work or activity

marina_removal.description: Forced removal of yacht from marina premises

access_ban.description: Prohibition from entering marina in future
